name: Turbidity / Water Clarity
functionStatement: Physical and chemical processes limit pollutants, retain beneficial constituents, and protect ecological and human uses.
descriptionMarkdown: Appears acceptable, minimal turbidity matching local reference conditions.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Measure turbidity using a tube or meter and compare to reference expectations. Supplement with available datasets where present.

inputs.label: Turbidity / Water Clarity
inputs.helpMarkdown: High resolution aerial imagery; Field photos; Brief field recon; Historical evidence

levels.label: Good
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Good: Mostly clear and consistent with reference. No obvious pollution. (Suggested index range 0.70-1.0)

levels.label: Fair
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Fair: Slight turbidity or discoloration. / Persistent cloudiness with habitat impacts. (Suggested index range 0.40-0.69)

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Poor: Persistently muddy water or visible sheen indicating severe pollution. (Suggested index range 0.0-0.39)

references: EPA Water Quality Portal (turbidity/TSS where available)
